This market is very popular among the population because of his attractive prices that is why Malik has a lot of clients. Malik’s goods are supplied from the neighboring town Istaravshan by himself. He tries to choose various goods of good quality and attractive prices which allows him keeping the clientele. The business brings the stable income and allows Malik to improve the living conditions for his family and thus he is accumulating money for arranging the marriage of his younger son. Today Malik requests 600 $ US Dollars for purchasing the blankets and underclothes in order to increase the range of goods. Malik would like to thank everybody for supporting him and promises that he will repay the loan in 12 months promptly. The progress of Malik’s business is on your hands. Your support will really help him.

loans.use: To upgrade stock and improve sales

loans.name: Mahchehra

texts.en: A. Mahchehra is 19-years old. She is not married and lives with her parents. Mahchehra is a market vendor who sells kids' clothing in the local market. After finishing school and entering university , Mahchehra started her own business because she needed money to be able to support her parents and pay for household and personal expenses. Mahchehra has been in this business for 2 years. For these years she managed to make her business stable and profitable so she can generate the income she needs for her family. Now Mahchehra is planning to expand her business and is requesting a loan of $1000 for the term of 12 months. This will enable her to upgrade her stock for the summer season. She promises to repay the loan promptly and thanks all supporting her.

loans.use: To upgrade stock and expand business

loans.name: Davlatmo

texts.en: B. Davlatmo is 37-years old. She is married and the loving mother of seven children. Her husband is tractor operator at a local farm. For more than 6 years, Davlatmo has been selling vegetables and fruits (tomatos, cucumbers, apricots, strawberries, cherries, etc.). Her elder sons help her with the business. Her business begins early morning at 5:00 a.m. She buys vegetables and fruits from the local farmers and sells them in the market.  She trades in the market that is loved among her people for its attractive prices. Davlatmo’s business generates a stable income for her family, and helps to ensure her children with a good future and education. Now that her business is really progressing, Davlatmo is requesting a loan of $600 for the term of 9 months. This will enable her to provide more choices for her customers. Davlatmo and her hopeful family are counting on your help. Be an important part of the growth of Davlatmo’s business.

loans.use: To purchase a wider range of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Bakhtier

texts.en:
G. Bakhtier is 37 years old. He is married and has four adorable children of school ages. Bakhtier’s wife is not working. She is housekeeper and taking care of their children. Bakhtier’s children are small now, but already today he is working hard in order to ensure the best future for them. 
Bakhtier has a very large family. Except for his wife and kids he is supporting his parents and sister. So that to be able to do it, he is running the business. He is selling the perfumery like perfume for women and men, deodorants, air fresheners, shaving cream and others. All the goods are supplied form Almaty, Kazakhstan.
Today Bakhtier requests 1000 $ US Dollars as he is planning to expand his business and increase the capital. After receiving of the good income from his business Bakhtier is planning to arrange the wedding of his sister. He would like to thank all supporting him and promises to pay the loan in 9 months. Your support will really help him. Be an important part of the growth of Bakhtier’s business.

loans.use: Purchasing the new perfumery in order to expand the business

loans.name: Kiemuddin

texts.en: I. Kiemuddin is 30-years old. His wife is a housekeeper, and they have four children. Kiemuddin’s children are small now, but already  he is working hard in to ensure a good future for them. Kiemuddin sells pastries, cookies, candies, condensed milk, tea, canned meat, mayonnaise, and other foodstuffs in his store. He has been in the business for 6 years and has many loyal customers.  His business is his family's main income. He is requesting a loan  of $600 for the term of 6 months. He will use the loan to upgrade and enlarge his stock, which will enable him to increase his income. Kiemuddin thanks everyone for support and promises to pay the loan in time.

loans.use: To upgrade and expand foodstuff stock

loans.name: Gulizor

texts.en: I. Gulizor is 47-years old. She is a widow and has two children: Suhrob, age 22, a student, and Gulandom age 19, who helps her mother with the business. Gulizor began selling clothing 10 years ago. Gulizor usually travels to Bishkek in the neighboring country Kyrgyzstan to purchase new goods. She tries to choose various goods of good quality and attractive prices that keeps ger customers happy. Gulizor is requesting a loan of $600 for the term of 6 months. In the middle of the June, Gulizor plans her next trip to Bishkek. She will use the loan to purchase summer season clothes for women and children. This will enhance her sales and increase her income.She promises to pay the loan in time and thanks everyone for support.

loans.use: To purchase summer season clothes for women and children

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.en: K. Gulchehra is 30-years old. She is married with two school-aged sons. Gulchehra has been selling women's clothing in the local market for 8 years. Her husband help her get started by providing the initial funds. Because she is hard working and polite, she has attracted loyal customers that return to buy from her. This business generates astable income for her family. Gulchehra is requesting a loan of $600 for the term of 6 months. She will use the loan to upgarde her stock and buy summer season clothes. Gulchehra is counting on your help. She expresses her gratitude to everyone supporting her and promises to repay the loan in time.

loans.use: To upgrade stock of women's clothing
